resources.string: Signets are part of the endgame gearing in TSW that provide a proc effect or passive stat boost. They can be attached to a talisman or weapon with an <font color="#ff4444">[Empty Signet Slot]</font> in order to combine the effect with the item itself.

Signets are divided into three types: green, blue and purple. It takes ten identical green signets to form a blue signet of the same name and ten identical blue signets to form a purple signet.
(Hint: you need 100 green signets with the same name to build one purple signet)
(Hint: an overview of all available signets can be found in the <font color="#ff4444"> [App Main Menu] > [Signet Overview]</font>)

To attach a signet, place the item and the signet in the [Assembly Window] and click the [ASSEMBLE] button.
(Hint: the item must be at full durability)
(Hint: read the signet description as signets can only be attached to the item type specified there. Detailed description of each signet can be found in the [App Main Menu] > [Signet Overview])

If an item contains a signet you can overwrite it with a new one.
(Hint: the old signet will be destroyed)
CLOSE Where do I get Signets? <

Signets cannot be crafted, but there are three possibilities to get signets:
> dropped by Nightmare and Lair mobs
(Hint: the location of these mobs can be found in the [App Main Menu] > [Farming Locations])

> Quests
(Hint: one [Signet Reward Bag] after completion)
(Hint: which quests guarantee signets and their locations can be found in the [App Main Menu] > [Quests])

> B&D Bank or Ealdwic Post Office in London. [BUY] > [Upgrade(ItemType)] > [Signet(SubType)]

Signets can be attached to a weapon or a talisman, but there is one restriction. Every signet belongs to a particular type that describes to which items it can be attached. These types are:\n (Hint: all signet types have a specific shape)

Signets can also be divided by the type of role you are playing in TSW. If you are playing a DPS you are only interested in signets that raise your offensive stats. Therefore you can divide the signets in three types: DPS, HEALER and TANK.
(Hint: a DPS can still attach a defensive signet, but it doesnâ€™t make much sense because you want to do as much damage as possible)
(Hint: All information is subject to change.)

Corruption :
Your affliction effects deal 5 / 10 / 15 % more damage.

Discipline :
When you are glanced you gain a 62 / 124 / 186 defense rating for 8 seconds.
(10 second cooldown)

Order :
When you block you gain a 10 / 20 / 30 % block chance for 4 seconds.
(10 second cooldown)

Reinforcement :
When you are glanced you gain magical and physical protection of 47 / 94 / 141 per stack for 4 seconds, up to 3 stacks.

Resilience :
When you block you gain 31 / 62 / 93 block rating per stack for 4 seconds, up to 3 stacks.

Abuse :
When you hit a target, you have a 10% chance to gain a damage increase of 7 / 14 / 21 % for 5 seconds.
(11 second cooldown)

Aggression :
When you hit a weakened target you have a 15% chance to gain 5 / 10 / 15 % damage increase for 6 seconds.
(10 second cooldown)

Benediction :
When you heal a target there is a 20% chance they will gain a barrier that absorbs 40 / 80 / 120 and lasts 10 seconds.

Breaching :
When you penetrate a target you have a 33% chance to make your target take 10 / 20 / 30 % more damage from further penetrating hits for 7 seconds.

Castigation :
When you hit a target you have a 10% chance to make your next 4 / 8 / 12 hits never miss.
(10 second cooldown)

Cruel Delight :
When you hit a weakened target, you have a 5% chance to be healed for 47 / 94 / 141 every 2 seconds for 8 seconds.

Detainment :
Your hinder effects last 10 / 20 / 30 % longer.

Extrication :
When you hinder a target you are healed for 40 / 80 / 120 .

Fury :
When you achieve 10 hits you gain 3 / 6 / 9 % damage increase for 6 seconds.
(6 second cooldown)

Interdiction :
When you impair a target you are healed for 26 / 53 / 78 every 2 for 6 seconds.

Laceration :
When you critically hit a target you gain a critical damage increase of 6 / 12 / 18 % for 15 seconds.
(15 second cooldown)

Obedience :
When you hit an impaired target you gain increased damage of 1 / 2 / 3 % per stack for 5 seconds, up to 3 stacks.

Opportunism :
When you hit an afflicted target, you have a 20% chance to hit them for an additional 48 / 95 / 144 damage.

Sadism :
When you hit a target you have a 10% chance to hit them for an additional 80 / 158 / 236 damage.

Temperance :
When you heal a target below 50% health they are healed for 24 / 48 / 72 every 2 seconds for 8 seconds.

Valour :
When you critically hit a target you gain a barrier that absorbs 40 / 80 / 120 and last 10 seconds.

Amelioration :
Your heal rating is increased by 47 / 94 / 141 .

Vigour :
Your health is increased by 165 / 330 / 494 .

Violence :
Your attack rating is increased by 47 / 94 / 141 .

Ablation :
When your health is below 50% the next 5 hits against you do 9 / 17 / 25 % less damage.
(12 second cooldown)

Assassination :
Your strike attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Barrage :
Your blast attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Cleaving :
Your focus attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Distortion :
Your Chaos attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Echoes :
Whenever you critically heal a target they gain a heal over time effect, healing them for 7 / 13 / 20 heal every 1 second for 5 seconds.

Equilibrium :
When you critically heal a target they gain a 5 / 10 / 15 % damage increase for 5 seconds.
(15 second cooldown)

Execution :
Your Assault Rifle attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Flux :
Your Elemental attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Fortification :
When your health is below 50% you gain a barrier that will absorb up to 126 / 252 / 277 damage for 10 seconds.
(12 second cooldown)

Harmony :
Your healing effects are increased by 1 / 2 / 3 %.

Hatred :
When you block, evade, or are glanced you generate a minor / medium / large amount of hate on your offensive target.
(6 second cooldown)

Hunger :
Your leech effects are increased by 1 / 2 / 3 %.

Liquidation :
Your Pistol attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Rage :
Your frenzy attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Recursion :
Your chain attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Rejuvenation :
When your health is below 50% you are healed for 50 / 100 / 150 and affected by a heal over time effect healing you for 19 / 38 / 57 every 2 seconds for 8 seconds.
(12 second cooldown)

Salvation :
When you block, evade, or are glanced, you gain 2 / 4 / 6 % damage reduction for 5 seconds.
(6 second cooldown)

Security :
Your barrier effects are increased by 1 / 2 / 3 %.

Serenity :
When you critically heal a target you reduce your offensives targets hate towards you by a small / medium / large amount.
(15 seconds cooldown)

Serration :
Your Fist attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Shards :
Your Shotgun attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Shattering :
Your Hammer attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Storms :
Your burst attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Subjugation :
When you land a critical or penetrating hit you reduce your offensive targets hate towards you by a small / medium / large amount.
(15 second cooldown)

Swords :
Your Blade attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Thirst :
When you critically heal a target they gain a 5 / 10 / 15 % leech effect 5 seconds.
(15 seconds cooldown)

Tomes :
Your Blood attacks do an additional 1 / 2 / 3 % damage.

Corruption :
Your affliction effects deal 5 / 10 / 15 % more damage.

Abuse :
When you hit a target, you have a 10% chance to gain a damage increase of 7 / 14 / 21 % for 5 seconds.
(11 second cooldown)

(10 second cooldown)

(15 second cooldown)

(15 second cooldown)

Augur :
Timber has an 11 / 22 / 33 % chance to deal 45% more damage.

Binding :
When you use Timber , all damage you receive is reduced by 5% for 2 / 4 / 6 seconds.

Charge :
Increase the radius of Hurly-Burly to 7 meters and damage dealt by 10 / 20 / 30 %.

Imprint :
Whenever you hit with Hurly-Burly , you gain a single stack of the Imprint effect, which increases your Magical and Physical Protection by 5 / 10 / 15 per stack for 8 seconds. Stacks up to 25 times.

Mod :
Diamond Grit pulses a point blank AoE, affecting up to 5 enemies in a 5 meter radius around you every second, dealing 38 / 77 / 115 physical damage.

Overdrive :
Increases the barrier of Diamond Grit by 10 / 20 / 30 %.

Seal :
Improves The Carver\'s Art to perform an additional hit at the end of the channel dealing 172 / 377 / 582 physical damage.

Tune :
Whenever you hit with The Carver\'s Art you also heal for 10 / 20 / 30 % of the damage dealt.

Augur :
Pop Shot causes a detrimental effect that deals a low/ medium/ high amount of damage after 2 seconds.

Binding :
Each enemy you kill with Pop Shot reduces its cooldown by 1/ 2/ 3 second(s).

Charge :
10/ 20/ 30% damage increase for Clusterstruck .

Imprint :
Clusterstruck has a 8/ 16/ 24% chance of not triggering its recharge timer.

Mod :
Reduces the damage you receive when you activate Death from Above to 6/ 3/ 0% of your maximum health.

Overdrive :
Whenever you activate Death From Above you gain a beneficial effect that increases your movement speed by 5/ 10/ 15% for 7 seconds.

Seal :
Big Red Button leaves a 5 meter radius area around your target for 5 seconds that does a low/ medium/ high amount of damage every second for 5 seconds on up to 5 enemies.

Tune :
Reduces movement penalty of Big Red Button by 33.3/ 66.6/ 100%.

Augur :
The Vector damage over time effect can spread up to 1 / 2 / 3 enemies in a 5 meter radius around your target.

Binding :
Reduces the activation time of Space by 0.3 / 0.5 / 0.7 seconds.

Charge :
Improves Collider to hit an additional target and increases damage dealt by 5 / 10 / 15 %.

Imprint :
Improves Collapse with a 3 / 6 / 9 meter backward dash.

Mod:
Increases the duration of the Charge heal over time effect by 1 / 2 / 3 seconds.

Overdrive :
Increases the effectiveness of the Density persistent ground area by 25 / 50 / 75 %.

Seal :
Increases the radius of Polestar by 1 / 2 / 3 meters. Increases the maximum number of targets by Polestar by 1 / 2 / 3 . Increases the damage dealt by Polestar by 3 / 6 / 9 %.

Tune :
While casting Oblivion and for 1 / 2 / 3 seconds after, you will be immune to all forms of crowd control.

There are total of 30 quests that give you a [Signet ???Reward??? Bag] after completion. The signet bag\'s color indicates the grade of the signet you find inside. To open a [Signet Reward Bag] just double-click it.
(Hint:[Signet Reward Bags] contain signets of every type.They have a bigger chance of droping major signets than Nightmare and Lair mobs)
Every area in TSW has <font color="#ff4444">one or more Nightmare and one Lair mobs zone</font>. The mobs have a <font color="#ff4444">special buff</font> that indicates their Nightmare/Lair status:

Mobs in the Nightmare zone can be soloed
(Hint: Mobs have 7k to 21k health points)
(Hint: QL10 gear with blue and/or purple parts)

Mobs in the Lair zone should be done in a group
(Hint: Mobs have 8k to 71k health points)

The mobs drop mostly minor signets, but there is a small chance of a major signet drop. Furthermore Lair mobs drop more major signets than nightmare mobs. There is also a possibility to summon Lair bosses that drop blue or even purple signets. As the mobs in every zone have different skills you should visit each of them and find out which farming location works best for you and/or your group. (Hint: Nightmare and Lair mobs are immune to hinder and impair effects)

Nightmare Zone [A]

Location: South of airport

Coordinates: 880, 650

Resurrection Point: Kingsmouth Municipal Airport

Mobs:
[Single]Corpse Clinger (14k HP)
[Single]Mouldering Bones (14k HP)
[Single]Pustular Undead (14k HP)
[Single]Guts Trawler (21k HP)
[Single]Freight Smasher (22k HP)
[Single]Freight Stomper (22k HP)
[Group]Weekend Warrior (3.6k HP)
